title: "Stern-Brocot"
output:
  github_document: default
---

```{r, echo=F, message=F, include=F}
devtools::load_all(".")
source('./man/code/plot.R')
source('./man/code/utils.R')
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>",
  fig.path = "man/figures/SternBrocotCurve-",
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE
)
bins=21
```

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
variance = 5e-05
path = paste0('./man/data/stern_brocot_',variance,'.rds')
fractions = readRDS(path)
```

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
print(plot_error_hist(fractions$error,
                      bins=bins,
                      'fundamental', 
                      variance,
                      'Stern-Brocot Curve'))
cat("  \n")
```
Number of Samples: `r fractions %>% nrow() %>% format(big.mark=',',scientific=F,trim=T)` \
Number of Bins: `r bins` \
